items.message:
River levels are falling at the Oakington but still high at Girton river gauges. Consequently, flooding of roads and farmland is still possible.  

We expect flooding to affect Cottenham Lode including Oakington Brook, Wash Pit Brook and Beck Brook.    

No further rainfall is expected tonight. We expect river levels to start falling tonight.

We are closely monitoring the situation. Please avoid using low lying footpaths near local watercourses and avoid contact with flood water.  

This message will be updated tomorrow morning, 15/09/2021, or as the situation changes.

River levels are rising at the Dernford river gauge as a result of heavy rainfall earlier today. Consequently, flooding of roads and farmland is possible later tonight. We expect flooding to affect the River Cam from Stapleford to Waterbeach   

No further rainfall is forecast tonight. We expect river levels to rise until lunchtime on 15/09/2021. 
We are closely monitoring the situation.

Please avoid using low lying footpaths near local watercourses and plan driving routes to avoid low lying roads near rivers, which may be flooded.

This message will be updated tomorrow morning, 15/09/21, or as the situation changes.

items.description: Oakington Brook and Beck Brook at Oakington and Westwick
items.message:
This Flood Warning has been removed.  
River levels have now fallen below the flood risk threshold. No further rainfall is forecast.  
We continue to monitor the situation.
